<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/ompcontext">OMPContext</a></>}>
The context for a source location is made up of active property traits, e.g., device=&#123;kind(host)&#125;, and constructs traits which describe the nesting in OpenMP constructs at the location. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/ompcontext/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>
